I thought my Irish bank references would work. They didn't. I had to pay a 'guarantor service' $500 to basically vouch for me. Read about this stuff BEFORE you sign anything."}]]}]

4a:["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground leading-relaxed","children":"Priya moved to Buenos Aires for inspiration and affordable living as a writer. She found both, but also found herself navigating an economy in crisis, learning to think in multiple currencies, and discovering that artistic inspiration sometimes comes from chaos."}]
4b:["$","div",null,{"className":"grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"space-y-3","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center gap-2 text-green-600 font-semibold","children":[["$","$L29",null,{"size":"sm"}],"The Good"]}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"space-y-2 text-sm","children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"text-muted-foreground","children":["â€¢ ","I can afford to write full-time here.
